title: Redditors Meet And Greet
content:
It would be awesome if some senior could take up the initiative and host a meet and greet on campus... There were a lot of discussions between us before the college started, it would be fun if we you guys can meet up and meet each other IRL

We can have a RR and EC campus meet and greet independently, and depending on the participation, we can have a off campus meet with graduates and batchmates

P.S Please upload the photos here!!

(Lemme know if any help is required from Mod)

comments.body:
I would say
1. Go to the 13th floor
2. Meet each other
3. Order Meghana's Biryani and have a chill evening

Yeah. Seems chill for RR. For EC
1. meet on the 6th floor 
2. Idk what good biryani place is here now.
3. ???
4. Profit.

Infact I'd be down for all of us to meet outside somewhere.
Need to make a poll then first ðŸ‘€

So yeah

People wanna do a meet and greet on campus

Anyone wanna take up the initiative
